[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1588614700672{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 149px !important;}” simple_background_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

Our Treatment

Eyelash Extensions & Brow Lamination

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

Bodyful Toronto offers eyelash and eyebrow treatment to give your eyes the perfect look. Learn about our eyelash extensions and brow lamination services below.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4257″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Eyelash Extensions[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Eyelash extensions is one of the fastest growing beauty industry careers and services.  Giving you the opportunity to wake up & looking amazing with a full set of eyelashes extensions on. We offer luxury eyelash extensions products with a multi certified lash technician for flawless application. Book your appointment with us today![/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Brow Lamination[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Between microblading, tweezing, tinting and threading, there’s a million different ways we can groom our eyebrows. ‘Brow lamination is a new trend in the brow industry and is originally from Russia. It’s the best procedure for taming tough and unruly hairs as it sets them in place so every hair lies in the same direction, giving a just-combed effect. It’s like a keratin treatment for your brows! The best bit is its vegan, cruelty-free and lasts up to 8 weeks![/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4264″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1588709087776{padding-top: 107px !important;padding-bottom: 94px !important;}” parallax_background_image=”4151″][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8″][vc_row_inner content_text_aligment=”center”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Reshape Your Body

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”24px”][vc_column_text]

Body Sculpting Treatments Customized Personally For You

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”24px”] BOOK NOW [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
